channel.title: Servers
channel.description:
look, im new to moparscape so don't laugh at me if you consider this a stupid question because i will simple just shrug it off...
when you look on the server page it has all the random server names , the random 100% thing and then "play now" high/low ...
how do i acctualy play on one of these servers, or is it not acctualy possible lol i just wanna play with other people..
p.s. when you connect to your own server how can you open gates and stuff, stupid i know but i was trying to get to canafis and tryed to open the gate and nothing happend..
really need help new to moparscape and really confused lol.. played on a server earlyer and now its down or something
help!
pot/...X

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @pot12341 pot12341
item.description:
@pot12341 wrote:

ok thank you :)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 07:30:12 PM[/size][hr]ugh, !! “status server page” i click it and it comes up with the names. and i click high detail and it just leaads to the game with the ip of 127.0.0.1 which is the one when your on your own etc… all i wanna do is play with other people >.<[br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 07:39:29 PM[/size][hr]any1??[br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 07:50:54 PM[/size][hr]don’t worry…

Read full topic

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @Ratchet2007 Ratchet2007
item.description:
@Ratchet2007 wrote:

just click the detail High/Low (Depending on how high or low you want the graphics to be) Also to let others in to your server read up a tut on starting a server and look on portforwarding…

Read full topic

item.title: Servers
item.dc:creator: @mjui123 mjui123
item.description:
@mjui123 wrote:

you click on the name of the server then type in the ip and that should be all not sure about gate things never tried openin a gate

Read full topic
